name: Square Sam
description:
Square Sam is a remake of a game called box Bob which I used as a base but then added high score, Missiles and Explosions.

The aim of the game is to get as far as you can without dying and every 10 seconds a missile will spawn and you will have to avoid it.

Game Tips

-The Reset button is for your high score Resetting it will set your high score to 0

-if you are pushed off the screen or hit a missile you will die

Controls

-Click - Jump
